
{{alias}}( str )
    Escapes regular expression special characters.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Escaped string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = 'Et tu, Brute?';
    > var out = {{alias}}( str )
    'Et tu, Brute\?'

    > str = '2 + 3 * 4 = 12';
    > out = {{alias}}( str )
    '2 \+ 3 \* 4 = 12'

    > str = 'The US federal budget was $3.8 trillion (in 2015)';
    > out = {{alias}}( str )
    'The US federal budget was \$3\.8 trillion \(in 2015\)'

    See Also
    --------
